sub_concepts.name: Naked Singularity
sub_concepts.definition: A type of singularity that is not hidden behind an event horizon in a black hole

sub_concepts.name: Singularities
sub_concepts.definition: Points in space where the laws of physics break down and the quantities like density and gravity become infinite

sub_concepts.name: Event Horizon
sub_concepts.definition: The boundary surrounding a black hole beyond which nothing can escape, not even light

sub_concepts.name: Black Holes
sub_concepts.definition: Objects in space with extremely strong gravitational fields that not even light can escape from within its boundary
